Why Every Dumbbell Smells Slightly Like Peppermint

In my first embassy assignment, a telepath mistook panic for mint gum. Since then, peppermint means "you are safe enough to finish the set." Branding came later.

FAQ, Waivers, and Quiet Panic

Why underwater payments?

Surface banking made people too confident. Underwater checkout forces slow breathing, deliberate choices, and fewer impulse purchases of neon kettlebells.

What if I forgot placing an order?

That is expected. Your package includes a notarized Memory Receipt Slip, signed by Dr. Pryce, plus a photo of you nodding at the subtotal.

Can I gift this to someone emotionally avoidant?

Yes. Select "anonymous concern" at checkout. We wrap it in chrome foil and include a neutral card: "Thought this might support your flexibility."

Are your trainers certified?

Certified by the Alien Embassy, two terrestrial agencies, and one grandmother who can detect excuses from a block away.

Do you offer subscriptions?

Yes. The Tidal Plan is $47.99/month. Includes one mystery tool, one stern memo, and priority receipt reprints.

What is your return window?

Thirty days from delivery, or fourteen days from your first sincere breakthrough, whichever arrives first.
